name: Fishy Slots Fun
description:
Like colorful and cute aquatic animals? Swim with fishy friends in "Fishy Slots Fun", a slot machine from Avalinx Studios. Enjoy stunning hand drawn artwork, at will make you feel like you've gone scuba diving.

Fishy Slots Fun, along with many of our other slot machines , participates in our progressive jackpot that increases continuously until someone gets lucky and hits the big one!

* 5 different bonus rounds to enjoy!

* Play up to 25 lines per spin!

* Compete with your friends in Game Center leader boards!

* Lock columns in place with your coins!

* Use 3x, 5x, 10x Boosters to increase Winnings!

The Fun Vegas Casino Experience on the go! Don't forget to check our Slots, Slot Machine and other casino apps, including blackjack, roulette, craps and poker.
